name: College View
description:
Controls:

Arrow Keys: MOVEMENT (Can move in 8 directions)

Enter: DIALOUGE 

Space: PUNCH (Ranged Attack)

Shift: DODGE ROLL (Can dodge roll in 8 directions)

Left Mouse Click: RESTARTS game on GAME OVER screen

Premise:

This game was a short school project about the anger that bullying can create in young children.
